data.title: Quick C Link to C Main Guiding Light to Support C Hold / Retake
data.description: Use this Guiding Light when rotating to C to catch enemy players pushing through C Main off guard and support your team.

data.title: Early Round A Main Info Flash
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective info flash for A Main.

data.title: Early Round C Lobby Info Flash
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Guiding Light from C Main for C Lobby.
